title: "Will physicians trust radiation therapies planned by AI?"
excerpt: "Radiation oncologists may favor radiation therapy plans produced by a machine-learning algorithm in simulations, but trusting in the plans for clinical use may be a different matter, according to research published online June 3 in Nature Medicine."
